articles.title: Charities urge Boris not to abandon cancer patients in second coronavirus wave - Daily Mail
articles.description: In a letter signed by 50 charities and doctors, the head of Cancer Research UK demands a firm commitment that diagnosis, treatment and clinical trials will not be delayed again.
